snippet: According to Clay Tarver, who wrote about Chavez's reuniting after a 15-year haitus for Matador Records' anniversary party, the band is working out new material.
abstract: According to Clay Tarver, who wrote about Chavez's reuniting after a 15-year haitus for Matador Records' anniversary party, the band is working out new material.
lead_paragraph: The Bowery Ballroom just announced that Chavez will play a show on May 18. This gig follows a series of festival dates - All Tommorrow's Parties in London, Primavera in Barcelona, the Pitchfork festival in Chicago. According to the guitarist Clay Tarver, who wrote about Chavez's reuniting after a 15-year hiatus for Matador Records' anniversary party, the band is even working out new material.
